channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Ventriloquist/The Puppeteer [BD/UNS Offensive]
channel.description:
**The Ventriloquist [Blue Dragon Offensive] [Unique]**
**Passive**: Uncontrollable Immune to occupation.
**Night Ability 1:** Control [Infinite Uses] You will control a player to visit another with the ability they were using that night. The person you control will know who they visited instead. You can't make them target the King, or themselves.
**Night Ability 2:** Connection [1 use] Target two players, nobody can visit them except the other player.
**The Puppeteer [Unseen Offensive] [Unique]**
**Passive:** Uncontrollable Immune to occupation.
**Day Ability:** Behind the Curtain [2 uses] The player you control tonight will not know who they visited or receive a night result, only knowing that they were controlled.
**Night Ability 1:** Control [Infinite Uses] You will control a player to visit another with the ability they were using that night. The person you control will know who they visited instead. You aren't restricted to who they visit.
